version_description:
从这个版本开始，Traces 成为可以免费下戴的应用软件，但只有高级用户才可使用记录GPX功能。之前购买的用户自动成功高级用户。
这一版本有如下更新：

- 更改默认记录路线名称为更短的形式，如“上午的跑步”
- 更改记录面版的格式，使横屏时占用空间更小
- 重新设计的 Apple Watch app
- 修复 iCloud Drive 同步bug

- 加入导航至星标功能
- 加入轨迹着色
- 改进的地址搜索栏
- 其他改进

- Performance improvement and bug fix
- Redesigned search text field
- Status bar can now be dragged up to display recording panel

*** Please note that this version is a public test. It provides the premium recording function for free. However, it lacks certain features such as multiple language support and Apple Watch support. It will come soon. ***

After a long wait, Traces 3 is finally here. Traces 3 has many significant changes, including:
- Upgraded from Swift 2 to Swift 3
- Redesigned star and trace detail view
- Redesigned map view to be aligned with Apple Maps
- Redesigned left side bar
- Optimized long distance recording (1000KM+)
